name: Ultimate Flickball Arena
description:
Ultimate Flick Arena is a casual game that mixes elements of pin-ball with similar physics based combat projectiles to take out enemies or your friends. With side winding maze maps, challenge yourself to solving those mazes, and beware of patrolling enemies.

With simple mechanics to get you started, to complex deft movement skills required to reach your full reaction skills potential, learn from and improve your skills.

Featuring game mechanics such as:
- Tricky Bounce Physics
- Bouncy projectiles
- Speed Boosting game items
- Speed Boosting and resource power ups

As well as further options for game play:
- Single Player Campaign
- Online Multi Player Battle Arena Elimination mode
- Survival Mini Games

Charge up your power to flick your character through side winding mazes, combating enemies and solving puzzles to complete objectives,
Later team up with your friends or go head to head in a Battle Arena mode to see who has the best navigation and combat skills.
